message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really like it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
Thank you for offering the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still believe we can find a price closer to my budget. I am proposing $115 for the product.
I'm still open to finding a mutually beneficial price. I can do $125, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
